args.prompt: A modern database showcase section for a Notion template listing, highlighting views, relations, rollups, and quick setup using a clean bento grid layout with icons and descriptive text.

recommendation.rationale: The user wants a specific database showcase section for a Notion template. The 21st_magic_component_builder is the most effective tool to generate a custom layout that highlights specific features like views and relations in a visually appealing way.

formattedBlock.title: Master Your Productivity with High-Performance Systems

suggestions.title: Add Visual Social Proof
suggestions.reason: Notion templates are highly visual products and users need to see the 'OS' in action.
suggestions.impact: Increases trust and reduces the perceived risk of a $59 purchase.
suggestions.action: Include a video walkthrough or high-resolution GIFs of the Gantt view and Habit tracker in the product gallery.

suggestions.title: Implement Tiered Pricing
suggestions.reason: A single $59 price point might alienate entry-level users or leave money on the table from power users.
suggestions.impact: Maximizes average order value and conversion rates across different user segments.
suggestions.action: Offer a 'Basic' version for $39 and a 'Team/Enterprise' version with a coaching call for $149.

suggestions.title: Focus on Time-Saved Metrics
suggestions.reason: High-performance users care most about efficiency and 'buying back' their time.
suggestions.impact: Strengthens the value proposition by moving from 'features' to 'ROI'.
suggestions.action: Add a headline or stat-highlight block stating: 'Save 10+ hours of administrative overhead every week.'
